column1: <title>Royal Scottish Geographical Society : International Excursions and Field Trips</title>
The Royal Scottish Geographical Society
Excursions and field trips to a wide range of destinations are organised by RSGS Headquarters and its various Regional Centres, sometimes in conjunction with other bodies.
Opportunities for special trips in the UK and abroad are advertised in the Society's newsletter Geogscot.
column2: Leaders are chosen for their experience or specialist knowledge, and visits are tailor-made for members in association with selected travel agents.

column1: Members have the chance also to contribute to geographical field work and research. &nbsp
